siteMetadata.head: Welcome to Fix Pics
siteMetadata.title: we restore your memory
siteMetadata.block1: Remember those old cameras and pictures that you printed so carefully and use to show everyone in nicely crafted well bound heavy albums ?
siteMetadata.block2: When last time you looked into those or shown others ?
siteMetadata.block3: But how many times you wanted to show those but thought it may just not worth the hassle of bringing those heavy albums and most likely being humiliated because of faded out quality of pictures stored in dark for years ?
siteMetadata.block4: Are you also scared that those photos might be lost their shine over years as they were not stored in right humidity and in right temperature ? Do you also feel ashamed that you may have lost many of those memories that were so close to your heart ?
